heroSubtitle: Easily edit, convert and sign PDFs. Fast, simple and secure.
uploadLimit: Up to 100 MB for PDF and up to 20 MB for DOC, DOCX, PPT, PPTX, XLS, XLSX, BMP, JPG, JPEG, GIF, PNG, or TXT
annotatePdfDesc: Add text, images, shapes, drawings, sticky notes, highlight and more.
editPdfDesc: Edit your PDF by removing, editing, or adding text and changing fonts, colors, and more.
signPdfDesc: Apply your signature, add initials, dates, checkboxes and more.
convertDocumentDesc: Easily convert files to PDF, Word, Excel, and more.
mergeDocumentsDesc: Combine PDFs in any order with our merger tool.
compressPdfDesc: Reduce file size while optimizing for maximal PDF quality.
redactPdfDesc: Permanently remove sensitive information from your PDF.
organizePagesDesc: Sort your PDF pages as you like. Delete or add pages as needed.
splitExtractPagesDesc: Split and extract PDF pages to create separate files.
passwordProtectDesc: Secure your PDFs by adding a password.
unlockPdfDesc: Remove PDF passwords for full access and flexibility.
addWatermarkDesc: Add a watermark or text as protection to your PDF files.
rotatePagesDesc: Rotate your PDFs pages in portrait or landscape mode.
deletePagesDesc: Remove one or multiple pages from your PDF.
cropPagesDesc: Crop and trim your documents with our PDF cropper.
advantagesTitle: The ultimate solution to edit and manage PDF documents with ease
advantagesSubtitle: QwerPDF meets all requirements to edit and manage PDF document!
pdfEditingMadeEasyDesc: Edit your PDFs effortlessly with our intuitive tools. Add text, images, annotations, or even e-signatures, all in just a few clicks.
safeAndSecureDesc: QwerPDF keeps your documents and privacy safe. You can boost security with features like file password encryption, encrypted storage, and more.
fastAndEasyDesc: Quickly convert your files to formats like Word, PDF, Excel, PNG, JPG, and more. Its quick, easy, and only takes a few seconds.
noSoftwareDesc: With QwerPDF, there's no need for downloads or browser extensions. Our PDF editor and converter are fully web-based, requiring only an internet connection to get started.
bannerSubtitle: All the PDF tools you need, in a single platform
contactUsDesc: Need assistance? Fill out the form below, and our team will get back to you as soon as we can.
subject: Subject
orSignInWithEmail: Or, sign in with your email
orSignUpWithEmail: Or, sign up with your email
passwordMinLength: The password must consist of at least 4 characters
allPdfToolsSubtitle: Choose from our comprehensive suite of {count}+ powerful tools designed to make your PDF workflows seamless.
browseFilesHint: or click to browse from your computer
uploadErrorFallback: Could not start the editor in this browser. Please try Chrome or disable Private Browsing.
trustedBy: Trusted by professionals from leading companies worldwide
advantagesSubtitleAlt: Everything you need to work with PDFs, all in one place
faqSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about our PDF tools
faqWhatIsAnswer: QwerPDF is an all-in-one online PDF editor that allows you to edit, convert, sign, and manage your PDF documents easily and securely. It provides over 50 tools for all your PDF needs.
faqNoInstall: Do I need to download or install anything to use QwerPDF?
faqNoInstallAnswer: No, QwerPDF is completely web-based. You can use all our tools directly in your browser without downloading any software or installing browser extensions.
faqMerge: Can I merge PDF files with QwerPDF?
faqMergeAnswer: Yes, you can easily merge multiple PDF files into one document using our Merge Documents tool. Simply upload your files and combine them in any order you prefer.
faqConvertWord: Can I convert a Word document into a PDF?
faqConvertWordAnswer: Absolutely! QwerPDF supports converting various file formats including Word (DOC, DOCX), Excel (XLS, XLSX), PowerPoint (PPT, PPTX), and images to PDF format.
faqOrganizePages: How do I add, move and rotate pages?
faqOrganizePagesAnswer: Use our Organize Pages tool to add, move, delete, or rotate pages in your PDF documents. Simply upload your PDF and drag pages to reorder them or use the rotation controls.
faqFreeTools: Why are certain websites offering PDF editing features for free?
faqFreeToolsAnswer: Some websites offer limited free features but may have restrictions on file size, number of documents, or include watermarks. QwerPDF provides full-featured premium tools with no limitations for subscribers.
faqSafeAnswer: Yes, QwerPDF uses industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your documents and personal information. Files are automatically deleted after processing unless you choose to save them.
guestUsageHint: PDF processing stays in your browser. Sign in with Google to unlock higher free usage.
limitedBrowserStorageDesc: Your file will still open and process normally in this tab, but we can’t save it for later. This often happens in Private Browsing. If you refresh or close this page, you may need to upload the file again.
resumeFromCache: Your PDF stays on your device. You can resume from the last file you opened or saved.
dropzoneConvertSubtitle: PDF, Office, images, or text files
toolNotImplemented: This tool is not implemented yet. Try Annotate, Sign, Convert, Merge, or Compress.
guestDocMissing: This document isn’t available on this device anymore. Upload a file to start again.

passwordLocalNote: This runs locally in your browser using qpdf (WebAssembly). Your password never leaves your device.

compressionRasterNote: Compression uses rasterization (images). Text/vectors may no longer be selectable.
redactionRasterNote: Redaction export rasterizes pages to permanently remove underlying text/vectors.

contactFaqGeneral1A: QwerPDF is an all-in-one online PDF editor that allows you to edit, convert, sign, and manage your PDF documents easily and securely.
contactFaqGeneral2Q: Do I need to download or install anything to use QwerPDF?
contactFaqGeneral3Q: Can I merge PDF files with QwerPDF?
contactFaqGeneral3A: Yes, you can easily merge multiple PDF files into one document.
contactFaqGeneral4Q: Can I convert a Word document into a PDF?
contactFaqGeneral4A: Yes. Our Convert tool currently supports PDF ↔ images/text and images → PDF. Office-to-PDF can be added via a backend conversion service.
contactFaqSecurity1A: QwerPDF runs core PDF operations locally in your browser for many tools, so your files don’t need to leave your device for basic edits, conversion, and compression.
contactFaqSecurity2A: This demo app does not store your documents server-side unless you explicitly upload them to an external service.
contactFaqBilling1Q: How can I cancel my subscription?
contactFaqBilling1A: You can cancel your subscription from your account settings.
checkoutCreateFailed: Unable to create checkout session. Please try again.
checkoutError: An error occurred. Please try again.
planFaq1A: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and other payment methods depending on your region.
planFaq2Q: Why are certain websites offering PDF editing features for free?
planFaq2A: Some websites offer limited free features but may have restrictions on file size, number of documents, or include watermarks.
planFaq3A: Yes, QwerPDF uses industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your documents and personal information.
planFaq4A: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time from your account settings.
planFaq5Q: What will happen if I cancel my subscription?
planFaq5A: You will continue to have access to premium features until the end of your billing period.
planFaq6Q: How can I cancel my subscription?
planFaq6A: You can cancel your subscription from your account settings under the Subscription section.
planFaq7A: Yes, subscriptions renew automatically unless you cancel before the renewal date.
paymentSuccessDesc: Thank you for subscribing to QwerPDF Premium. You now have unlimited access to all our PDF tools.
unsubscribeTitle: How to Cancel Your QwerPDF Subscription
unsubscribeIntro1: Thank you for visiting QwerPDF.com! We truly value your business and appreciate having you as our customer.
unsubscribeIntro2: To get started, simply follow these three easy steps:
unsubscribeStep1Desc: to access the Sign In page.
unsubscribeStep2Title: 2. Once you are logged into your dashboard, access the settings in the top right corner of your screen.
unsubscribeStep2Desc: From your settings, click on "Subscription". This will bring you to the appropriate page to cancel your account.
unsubscribeStep3Desc: Follow all the steps to cancel your account.
unsubscribeHelpDesc1: If you have any trouble logging in, please try signing in with Google again.
unsubscribeHelpDesc2Prefix: If you still have issues, please
unsubscribeHelpDesc2Suffix: to confirm that your account is still active.
faqGeneral1A: QwerPDF is an all-in-one online PDF editor that allows you to edit, convert, sign, and manage your PDF documents easily and securely.
faqGeneral2Q: Do I need to download or install anything to use QwerPDF?
faqGeneral2A: No, QwerPDF is completely web-based. You can use all our tools directly in your browser without downloading any software.
faqGeneral3Q: Can I merge PDF files with QwerPDF?
faqGeneral3A: Yes, you can easily merge multiple PDF files into one document using our Merge Documents tool.
faqGeneral4Q: Can I convert a Word document into a PDF?
faqGeneral4A: Absolutely! QwerPDF supports converting various file formats including Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and images to PDF.
faqGeneral5Q: How do I add, move and rotate pages?
faqGeneral5A: Use our Organize Pages tool to add, move, delete, or rotate pages in your PDF documents.
faqGeneral6Q: Why are certain websites offering PDF editing features for free?
faqGeneral6A: Some websites offer limited free features but may have restrictions on file size, number of documents, or include watermarks. QwerPDF provides full-featured premium tools with no limitations.
faqSecurity1A: Yes, QwerPDF uses industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your documents and personal information.
faqSecurity2Q: Where does QwerPDF store my documents?
faqSecurity2A: Your documents are stored on secure cloud servers with encryption. Files are automatically deleted after processing unless you choose to save them to your account.
faqSecurity3Q: Does QwerPDF support single sign on?
faqSecurity3A: Yes, we support SSO (Single Sign-On) for enterprise customers through various identity providers.
faqSecurity4Q: How do I Password Protect a PDF?
faqSecurity4A: Upload your PDF to QwerPDF, select the Password Protect tool, set your desired password, and download the secured file.
faqBilling1A: Yes, subscriptions renew automatically unless you cancel before the renewal date.
faqBilling2Q: How can I cancel my subscription?
faqBilling2A: You can cancel your subscription from your account settings under the Subscription section.
faqBilling3Q: What will happen if I cancel my subscription?
faqBilling3A: You will continue to have access to premium features until the end of your billing period. After that, your account will revert to free features.
faqBilling4Q: What does the paid trial give me access to?
faqBilling4A: The paid trial gives you full access to all premium features for a limited time.
faqBilling5A: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time from your account settings.
faqBilling6A: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and other payment methods depending on your region.
